text: The Invisible Man is a science fiction novel by H. G. Wells. The Invisible Man is about Griffin, a scientist who has focused himself to research into optics. He later makes himself invisible. The novel is a very famous and important horror novel, and helped make Wells the "father of science fiction". The novel was made into made movies, famously in 1933 and in 2020. ==References== Category:British science fiction books Category:Books by H. G. Wells Category:1890s books
title: The Invisible Man
